text: Harold Moore may refer to: * Harold Moore (metallurgist) (1878–1972), British metallurgist * Hal Moore (1922–2017), U.S. Army officer * Harold E. Moore (1917–1980), American botanist * Khalid Abdul Muhammad (born Harold Moore Jr., 1948–2001), American black activist * Harold Moore, co-founder of the Association of Comics Magazine Publishers ==See also== *Harry Moore (disambiguation)
title: Harold Moore
